block.p: MUSCHEL-Chaim. Young Israel of Harrison mourns the passing of Chaim Muschel, beloved father of its devoted Rebbitzin, Faygie Bienenfeld (and Rabbi Yaakov Bienenfeld), and extends heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family. Shiva, ending at 3 P.M. August 25, will be observed at 1493 E. 9th St. (between N and O), Bklyn. Services at 7 A.M. and 7:30 P.M. Stephen J. Apple, Pres.
